column4: ok, I've tried three versions of ubuntu, two different boxes and both are flaky with network connections.  Ping works, ifconfig shows up but many system apps like update/firefox/etc cannot connect.  I've checked and the computer is not even trying to get out (tcpdump on firewall)  this only happens on ubuntu
gentoo, centos, and suse all worked fine
you might try disabling ipv6, but it could have to do with the driver ubuntu uses for your card. Honestly, i'm not sure though.
